title: Codex
description: An AI chat bot that takes a user prompt and writes code with the OpenAI api.
technology: OpenAI, JavaScript, HTML, Node.js, Express.js, Vite, Vercel, Render

title: The Dali House
description: A Full-Stack (MERN) AI image generator that uses the OpenAI api to generate the images based on a user prompt. The user can then save the image to the community gallery and it will be saved in mongodb and cloudinary.
technology: React, OpenAI, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, HTML, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Cloudinary, Vite, Vercel, Render

title: React Dashboard
description: A React application that tests out the various apps, charts and tables from Syncfusion. The application also has the ability to switch the theme color, between a few set choices, and a light/dark mode.
technology: React, Syncfusion, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, HTML, Vercel

title: Hoobank
description: The frontend for a modern banking company written in React and TailwindCSS.
technology: React, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, HTML, Vercel

title: Framer Motion
description: I got bored and decided to play with animations from Framer motion for a little while.
technology: React, Framer-motion, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Github

title: The Featured Edge
description: This is a website designed for custom knife aficionados. It is a place for those in the custom knife community to show off their hard work, get ideas for future projects, or just appreciate the art of talented craftsmen. We highlight a knife maker each month, and send out a monthly newsletter to our members.
technology: React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Node.js, Express.js, Firebase, MongoDB, Bootstrap, Cloudinary, Mail Chimp, Heroku

title: Horse Manager
description: Horse Manager is an application that allows barn managers to keep track and input a horse's daily upkeep. In the application the barn manager can add specific details of a horses diet information to when they were last vaccinated along with specific notes. Not only is this beneficial to the barn manager but also the horse owner. It allows the horse owner to also log in to see these details about their horses.
technology: Handlebars, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, Bulma, Heroku

title: Employee Directory
description: An employee list, written in React.js, that displays a list of employees from the Random User API and allows them to be searched dynamically, and sorted by name.
technology: React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Node.js, Express.js, Random User API, Bootstrap
